document_data.name: Elven steel
document_data.mainbody: '''Elven steel''' was a metal produced by the [[elves]] of the Realms, used to forge [[:Category:Blades|bladed weapons]] and armor.
document_data.Properties: Elven steel was just as strong as the finest steel produced by other folk of the Realms, but with half the weight. It held the reputation of piercing through armor with ease.
document_data.Availability: Armor formed from elven steel could not be readily purchased by many, but was sometimes offered as a gift to non-elves.
document_data.Applications: Weapons wielded by the [[Evereskan tomb guardian|Tomb Guard]] of [[Evereska]] were forged from elven steel.
